quick_learner.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/data01_01.png
quick_learner.name: Quick Learner

church_helper.description: Someone who often helps out at the local church.
church_helper.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Job Icons/Resized/clothes06_02.png
church_helper.name: Church Helper

wizarding_license_apprentice.description: A license to practice wizardy. Since it's an Apprentice's license, there's no need to take an exam.
wizarding_license_apprentice.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/card03_01.png
wizarding_license_apprentice.name: Wizarding License (Apprentice)

diligent_student.description: A diligent student who studies every day.
diligent_student.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Job Icons/Resized/note01_04.png
diligent_student.name: Diligent Student

apprentice_carpenter.description: A novice in the field of carpentry.
apprentice_carpenter.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/wood.png
apprentice_carpenter.name: Apprentice Carpenter

basic_combat_training.description: Unlocks basic follow up attacks. (Excess action points are used to perform basic attacks.).
basic_combat_training.name: Basic Combat Training

basic_magic_training.description: Someone who studied the basics of magic.
basic_magic_training.name: Student Of Magic

basic_melee_training.description: Someone who learned the basics of fighting in the front lines.
basic_melee_training.name: Vanguard In Training

basic_theology.description: Someone who learned a little bit of theology.
basic_theology.name: Apprentice Acolyte

local_preacher.description: A familiar sight behind the pulpit.
local_preacher.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Job Icons/Resized/rosary_02.png
local_preacher.name: Local Preacher

maid_training.description:
Someone who went through basic maid training for working in the palace. 
The training focused on speed and efficiency, doing more work in less time.
maid_training.name: Maid Training

budding_chef.description:
Ink magic was surprisingly useful in adding a bit of flair to cooking. 
An apprentice chef recognized by the head maid.
budding_chef.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Job Icons/Resized/book03_01.png
budding_chef.name: Budding Chef

fireball.description: Learned how to cast fireballs in combat.
fireball.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/element03_01.png
fireball.name: Fireball

meteor.description:
Learned how to cast meteor in combat. 
Should they really be teaching something like this in school?
meteor.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/meteor.png
meteor.name: Meteor

intermediate_combat_training.description: Unlocks advanced follow up attacks. (Switches targets and continues attacking if target dies.)
intermediate_combat_training.name: Intermediate Combat Training

honorary_officer.description:
A shiny certificate proving honorary officerhood.
It's almost certain her majesty signed this as a joke. Signatures from Rice and Hiyori are also present.
Unlocks advanced follow up attacks. (Switches targets and continues attacking if target dies.)
honorary_officer.name: Honorary Magic Officer

blessing.description:
An excellent buff spell mostly used by high level priests. 
Learning this probably took a few twists and turns.
blessing.name: Blessing

light_barrier.description:
A 'super invincible spell'. 
In theory, it's hard to lose a fight after casting this.
light_barrier.name: Light Barrier

finishing_blow.description:
A single strong, extremely powerful hit executed with speed and precision.
Suitable for fighting single enemies.
finishing_blow.name: Finishing Blow
